Package com.vagsoft.bookstore.controllers

Class CartController

java.lang.Object
com.vagsoft.bookstore.controllers.CartController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="/carts") @Validated(OrderedValidation.class) public class CartController extends Object
REST controller for endpoints related to carts.

      @IsAdmin @GetMapping("/{userID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CartReadDTO> getCartByUserId(@PathVariable @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) @ExistsResource(repository=UserRepository.class,message="User with given ID does not exist",groups=ExtendedValidation.class) @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) Integer userID)
